products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: IBR CLEARANCE AT SITE BEFORE AND/OR AFTER FABRICATION / ERECTION OF ANY STATIC EQUIPMENTS AND ITS INTERNALS UNDER IBR SERVICE ETC.
products_entries.full_product_description: Getting IBR Clearance at Grade at Site before and / or after fabrication, assembly, erection of any static equipment and its internals (i.e. Steam Coils) etc. under IBR service. Providing all tools & tackles including necessary equipment, machineries, skilled or unskilled manpower, providing scaffolding including temporary platforms, ladders for all heights, material, consumables, supervision etc. for carrying out inspection by IBR representative / authorized inspector before starting of fabrication, assembly and erection works as well as inspection after completion of fabrication / erection works for following Tank Tag Nos. and to complete the work in all respect as per IBR Code, specifications, drawings and direction of Engineer In- Charge. 1)- 304-T-16(M) 2)- 304-T-21 3)- 304-T-22
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: service: ibr(indian boiler regulations), includes: tools & tackles, equipment, machineries, skilled or unskilled manpower, scaffolding, temporary platforms, ladders, material, consumables, supervision, inspection by ibr(indian boiler regulations) representative or authorized inspector, as per ibr(indian boiler regulations) code, specifications, drawings, direction of engineer in charge, tank tag nos: 304-t-16(m), 304-t-21, 304-t-22

products_entries.full_product_description: Plate work for Fixed Roof Tanks (Cone and Dome roof tanks) and covered Floating Roof tanks except Floating Roof: Procurement of all plates as per specifications, transportation to work site, fabrication and erection of shell, bottom (Sketch plates and annular plates including backing strips), cone roof, Dome roof, compression ring/knuckle plate, plate fabricated wind girders, wind girder opening, bearing plates for pipe supports, datum plates, shell manhole- necks, bolting and cover flanges for shell-man-holes, reinforcement pads for shell manholes, nozzle reinforcing pads, roof manhole-necks, bolting and cover flanges for roof manholes, reinforcing pads for Roof manholes, clean-out door assembly (including davit assembly), gusset- support for wind girders, Sump for drain nozzle, pads for all appurtenances and attachments, drip rings (Sketch No.: B568-000-80-42-SK-0002), fabrication and installation of all items as per drawing, conducting tests such as vacuum test, MP/DP test, pneumatic test, oil penetrant examination, Grouting work (including the supply of grouting material, as required for the tanks installed on ring wall foundation) underneath the Annular/ bottom plate  as per the specifications attached, tank hydrotest, etc. for shell, bottom and roof as specified, radiography including supply of films, all heat treatment specified in drawings/ specifications/ codes, preparation of drawings as per specifications, standards and relevant codes and getting the same reviewed by Owner/EIL, providing all temporary structures, clamps, wedges, including arrangement of all materials, consumables, labour, equipment, machinery, tools, tackles etc. to complete the work in all respects as per drawings, specifications, standards, codes, scope of work, scope of supply and instructions of Engineer- in-Charge. All bolting, gaskets wherever required as per scope of supply and scope of work shall be supplied and installed by Contractor. Spares 10% bolting (min. 2 nos.) and 200% spare gaskets shall be included in Contractor's scope. Any other (Commissioning etc.) spares as mentioned in tender specifications shall be also be included in Contractor's scope.  Quoted price shall be inclusive of supply of all bolts, nuts, gaskets including spares. IS 2062 Gr. E250 (A, BR, B0, C)
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: application: fixed roof tanks (cone and dome roof tanks), covered floating roof tanks except floating roof, material: as per specifications, includes: shell, bottom (sketch plates and annular plates including backing strips), cone roof, dome roof, compression ring/knuckle plate, plate fabricated wind girders, wind girder opening, bearing plates for pipe supports, datum plates, shell manhole-necks, bolting and cover flanges for shell-man-holes, reinforcement pads for shell manholes, nozzle reinforcing pads, roof manhole-necks, bolting and cover flanges for roof manholes, reinforcing pads for roof manholes, clean-out door assembly (including davit assembly), gusset-support for wind girders, sump for drain nozzle, pads for all appurtenances and attachments, drip rings (sketch no.: b568-000-80-42-sk-0002), tests: vacuum test, mp/dp test(magnetic particle/dye penetrant), pneumatic test, oil penetrant examination, grouting work (including supply of grouting material for tanks on ring wall foundation), tank hydrotest, radiography (including supply of films), heat treatment as per drawings/specifications/codes, preparation of drawings as per specifications, standards and relevant codes, review by owner/eil, temporary structures, clamps, wedges, arrangement of all materials, consumables, labour, equipment, machinery, tools, tackles, all bolting, gaskets as per scope, spares: 10% bolting (min. 2 nos.), 200% spare gaskets, commissioning spares as per tender, standard: is(indian standard) 2062 gr. e250 (a, br, b0, c)

products_entries.full_product_description: SOR description same as item No. 01VV.MJ2.1 SA 537 CL.1
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: sa 537 cl.1, description: same as item no. 01vv.mj2.1

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: External Surfaces (underside of Bottom & Drip Ring plate):
products_entries.full_product_description: Surface preparation to SSPC-SP-10, application of primer and paint on underside of bottom plate (soil side) and on underside of Drip Ring (soil side) as per painting system defined below and other requirements as specified in respective Engg.  data sheets including supply of metallic and non-metallic materials, primer and paint of approved quality, labour, equipment, consumables, etc.  to complete the work in all respect, as per applicable standard specifications, standards attached elsewhere in the tender document and instructions of Engineer- in-Charge. All materials shall besupplied by Contractor. Design Temperature Range:   -29 °C To   400 °C  Primer:   1 coat of inert polymeric matrix coating @125 microns   Finish Paint:   1 coat of inert polymeric matrix coating @125 micron   Remarks:   250-300
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: surface preparation: ss(pc)-sp-10(steel structures painting council - near white metal blast cleaning), application: primer and paint on underside of bottom plate (soil side) and underside of drip ring (soil side), material: metallic and non-metallic materials, primer and paint of approved quality, design temperature range: -29 °c to 400 °c, primer: 1 coat of inert polymeric matrix coating @125 microns, finish paint: 1 coat of inert polymeric matrix coating @125 micron, as per engineering data sheets, standard specifications, standards attached in tender, instructions of engineer-in-charge, all materials supplied by contractor, remarks: 250-300

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, fabrication, installation, welding, radiography, PAUT, UT, DPT , heat treatment, inspection and testing as required for the following nozzles (reinforcing pads covered under plate work) pipe, nozzle flanges and blind / companion/matching flanges (including davit/ hinge assembly for Man way) wherever shown on drawings and standards along with gaskets and boltings including supply of mandatory spares, conducting air pressure test for reinforcing pads, preparation of drawings, getting the same reviewed by Owner/EIL, arrangement of all materials, consumables, labour to complete the work as per drawings, specifications , standards, codes, scope of work, scope of supply and instructions of Engineer-in- Charge. All internal bolting shall be SS 304 as a minimum and contractor shall include the same in his scope of supply and shall be included in nozzle assembly quoted price. Spare gaskets (2 nos.) and 10% spare bolting (minimum 2 nos.) shall be included in Contractor's scope of supply and shall be included in nozzle assembly quoted price. Shell   Nozzle   300   Class   WNRF   Type   24 Inch  Size   SA 105   Material
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: includes: supply, fabrication, installation, welding, radiography, paut(phase array ultrasonic testing), ut(ultrasonic testing), dpt(dye penetrant testing), heat treatment, inspection, testing, pipe, nozzle flanges, blind/companion/matching flanges, davit/hinge assembly for man way, gaskets, boltings, mandatory spares, air pressure test for reinforcing pads, preparation of drawings, review by owner/eil, arrangement of all materials, consumables, labour, all internal bolting: ss 304(stainless steel 304) minimum, spare gaskets: 2 nos., 10% spare bolting (minimum 2 nos.), shell nozzle: 300 class, wnrf(weld neck raised face) type, material: sa 105

products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, fabrication, erection, inspection and testing of steel structure for cone roof/ dome roof tank including curb angle, spiral stairway, cage ladder, handrail, top and intermediate platform, grating for stairway steps and platform, rolling ladder including track for floating roof, anchor chairs,  name plates, earthing connections, ladder rungs for ladders in covered roof tanks, wind girder fabricated from rolled section, wind girder bracings/ support, external structural supports, supports for shell extension for foam nozzles in case of floating roof tanks, stiffeners for shell extension plate of stairway, ventilation slots and over flow slots for covered floating roof tank including SS wire mesh, support for drip rings (Sketch No.: B568-000-80-42-SK-0002), preparation of drawings, getting the same reviewed/ approved by owner/ EIL, arrangement of all materials, consumables, labour, equipment/ machinery, tools and tackles required to complete the work as per drawings, specifications, standards, codes, scope of work, scope of supply and instructions of Engineer- in-Charge. All materials to be supplied by Contractor. Material: IS 2062
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: application: cone roof/dome roof tank, includes: curb angle, spiral stairway, cage ladder, handrail, top and intermediate platform, grating for stairway steps and platform, rolling ladder with track for floating roof, anchor chairs, name plates, earthing connections, ladder rungs for ladders in covered roof tanks, wind girder fabricated from rolled section, wind girder bracings/support, external structural supports, supports for shell extension for foam nozzles in case of floating roof tanks, stiffeners for shell extension plate of stairway, ventilation slots and overflow slots for covered floating roof tank, ss(stainless steel) wire mesh, support for drip rings, preparation of drawings, review/approval by owner/eil, arrangement of all materials, consumables, labour, equipment/machinery, tools and tackles, all materials to be supplied by contractor, material: is 2062(indian standard 2062)

products_entries.full_product_description: Design, Supply, fabrication, erection, inspection and testing of steel structure for cone roof/ dome roof supporting structure, preparation of drawings, getting the same reviewed/ approved by owner/ EIL, arrangement of all materials, consumables, labour, equipment/ machinery, tools and tackles required to complete the work as per drawings, specifications, standards, codes, scope of work, scope of supply and instructions of Engineer- in-Charge. All materials to be supplied by Contractor. Roof Structure Designed by Contractor Material: IS 2062
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: application: cone roof/dome roof supporting structure, includes: preparation of drawings, review/approval by owner/eil, arrangement of all materials, consumables, labour, equipment/machinery, tools and tackles, all materials to be supplied by contractor, roof structure designed by contractor, material: is 2062(indian standard 2062)

products_entries.full_product_description: SUPPLY & INSTALLATION OF JET MIXER ASSEMBLY Contractor to supply and install the jet mixer assembly (RF pad, nozzle neck, internal flanges, bolts, nuts gaskets etc. and any other components required to conduct testing of jet mixer to be included in scope of supply) as per the tank jet mixer Process Data Sheet & Mechanical Data Sheet. Contractor scope includes the complete Residual Engineering of Jet Mixers including detailing of nozzle etc. in accordance to Process Data Sheets and relevant notes of Mechanical Data Sheet. All necessary Drawing / Design Calculations shall be provided furnished and provided by Contractor for EIL review. (PDS No.: B568-304-79-41-DS-1901 & B568-304-79-DS-1901; MOC: SS 304L / SS 316L). Nozzle Size - 10 Inch
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: includes: rf pad, nozzle neck, internal flanges, bolts, nuts, gaskets, any other components required for testing, as per tank jet mixer process data sheet & mechanical data sheet, residual engineering of jet mixers, detailing of nozzle as per process data sheets and mechanical data sheet, drawing/design calculations for eil review, pds no.: b568-304-79-41-ds-1901 & b568-304-79-ds-1901, material of construction: ss 304l(stainless steel 304l)/ss 316l(stainless steel 316l)

products_entries.full_product_description: Dismantling of Existing tanks: Disconnecting of all the piping connections including cleaning, instruments, ladder, staircase, platforms, insulation and the all other attachments in the existing tanks. Dismantling of existing tanks, Preparation of dismantling schemes & the same to be approved by client /EIL, getting the necessary tools, tackles, machinery, equipment, cranes, providing Scaffolding etc to dismantle the tanks in sequential planned manner following all terms and conditions to suit the site conditions and the same shall be transported to dump yard as per Instructions of Engineer In-Charge. The following tank to be dismantled Item no: 304-T-16 Cone Roof Type For more details, refer existing AS BUILT drawing attached elsewhere in the tender.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: includes: disconnecting piping connections, cleaning, instruments, ladder, staircase, platforms, insulation, all other attachments, dismantling of existing tanks, preparation of dismantling schemes, approval by client/eil, tools, tackles, machinery, equipment, cranes, scaffolding, sequential dismantling, transportation to dump yard, as per instructions of engineer in-charge, tank to be dismantled: item no: 304-t-16 cone roof type, reference: as built drawing

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: APPURTENANCES > STORAGE TANKS > STRUCTURAL/PIPES > STILL WELLS/ DIP PIPES
products_entries.full_product_description: CALIBRATION Carrying out calibration of tanks including supply of strapping tapes, scaffolding wherever required, arranging the visit of competent authority, all accessories, labour, preparation and submission of calibration charts duly approved by Competent authority etc. and complete the work in all respect as per Codes, specifications, standards and instructions of Engineer-in-Charge Diameter (Meters) :   > 10 to 25   Height (Meters) :   > 10
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: includes: supply of strapping tapes, scaffolding, arranging visit of competent authority, all accessories, labour, preparation and submission of calibration charts, approval by competent authority, as per codes, specifications, standards and instructions of engineer-in-charge

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: APPURTENANCES > STORAGE TANKS > STRUCTURAL/PIPES > STILL WELLS/ DIP PIPES
products_entries.full_product_description: APPLICATION OF HOT INSULATION Supply  of  all  materials,  application  of  hot  insulation  as  per  applicable on outside surface of tank shell, roof, nozzles, manholes, appurtenances, attachments  etc., including  supply  of  all  materials  and  installation  of  all  insulation  supports as per  applicable standard  and  completing  the  work  in  all  respect  as  per drawings, specifications, standards and instructions of Engineer-in-Charge.  Surface preparation  and primer application on insulated surfaces is covered under painting Schedule of  rate. All materials shall be supplied by Contractor. Insulation Type :   IH   Insulation Material :   Rockwool Thickness :   60 mm
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: insulation type: ih, insulation material: rockwool, application: outside surface of tank shell, roof, nozzles, manholes, appurtenances, attachments, includes: supply and installation of insulation supports, as per applicable standard, drawings, specifications, standards and instructions of engineer-in-charge, surface preparation and primer application covered under painting schedule of rate, all materials supplied by contractor

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: APPURTENANCES > STORAGE TANKS > STRUCTURAL/PIPES > STILL WELLS/ DIP PIPES
products_entries.full_product_description: HEATING COIL (STEAM TRACING etc.) / COOLING COIL For heating/ cooling coils inside the tank, external tracing coils on tank's shell/ roof: Supply of all materials (i.e. coil pipes, inlet and outlet nozzles (necks & flanges) on tank shell as well for tracing pipes, supports/ welded clips/ all SS 304 clamps / bolting material etc.), fabrication of coil as per drawings, installation of the same in position along with all associated items (supports/ clamps/ clips/ nozzles/ duly bolted, including radiography of all weld joints and hydrotesting of coil as per specifications, preparation of layout arrangement & fabrication drawings and getting the same approved by Owner/ EIL as per standards, specifications, instruction of Engineer-in- Charge. (Note: Supporting structures/ welded clips are covered under Structural/ Plate work). Coil pipe material:   SA 106 Gr. B   Coil pipe Size (NB)   50
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: coil pipe material: sa 106 gr. b, includes: supply of all materials (coil pipes, inlet and outlet nozzles (necks & flanges), tracing pipes, supports, welded clips, ss 304 clamps, bolting material), fabrication and installation as per drawings, radiography of all weld joints, hydrotesting, preparation and approval of layout arrangement & fabrication drawings, as per standards, specifications, instruction of engineer-in-charge, supporting structures/welded clips covered under structural/plate work

products_entries.full_product_description: Slot Dipping Device: Supply & installation of "Slot Dipping Device" for the tankages mentioned in the data sheets/ drawings/ specifications as per the Specifications & Standards attached with the tender. Arrangement of machinery, tools & tackles, labour etc. to accomplish the installation of the same shall also be in the scope of Contractor. Size:   6 Inch  Material:   CS
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: cs(carbon steel), includes: supply & installation for tankages as per data sheets/drawings/specifications, arrangement of machinery, tools & tackles, labour for installation in contractor's scope

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: APPURTENANCES > STORAGE TANKS > STRUCTURAL/PIPES > STILL WELLS/ DIP PIPES
products_entries.full_product_description: PAINTING OF TANKS PAINTING FOR CARBON STEEL AND LOW ALLOY STEEL TANKS External  Surfaces (except underside of bottom plate): Surface  preparation to SSPC-SP-10,  application  of  primer  and  paint on  all external  surfaces  of  tanks  including insulated  tanks i.e.  external  shell,  wind girders,  appurtenances,  roof  tops including top side  of  floating  roof  of  open tanks  as  well  as  covered floating  roof  tanks, external roof supporting structure, associated  structural  steel  works,  ladders,  walkways, platforms,  handrails,  spiral stairway,  rolling  ladder  and  track,   internal surface of shell above maximum liquid level exposed to atmosphere for open top or floating roof tanks as  per painting system defined below and other  requirements  as  specified  in  respective  Engg. data  sheets, stencilling  tank  no., capacity, name of stored  product,  painting Emblem as  per  the  attached  sample,  including  supply of metallic  and  non- metallic materials,  primer  and  paint  of  approved  quality,  providing  scaffolding, labour,  equipment,  consumables,  etc.  to  complete  the  work  in  all respect as  per applicable standard specifications,  standards  attached elsewhere in the tender document and  instructions  of  Engineer- in-Charge. All materials shall be supplied by Contractor. Design Temperature Range:   126 °C  To   450 °C  Primer:   1 coat of F-16 @ 125µ DFT/coat   Finish Paint:   1 coat F-16 @ 125µ DFT/coat   Remarks:   Total DFT Microns  (min.)  250
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: applicable tanks: carbon steel and low alloy steel, surface preparation: sspc-sp-10, primer: 1 coat of f-16 @ 125µ dft/coat, finish paint: 1 coat f-16 @ 125µ dft/coat, total dft microns (min.): 250, design temperature range: 126 °c to 450 °c, includes: supply of metallic and non-metallic materials, primer and paint of approved quality, scaffolding, labour, equipment, consumables, stencilling tank no., capacity, name of stored product, painting emblem, as per standard specifications and engineer-in-charge instructions
